title: Dairy-Free Pancakes
instructions: In a large bowl, whisk together flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt.
Add almond milk, vegetable oil, and vanilla extract, whisking until smooth.
Heat a lightly oiled griddle over medium-high heat.
Pour 1/4 cup of batter for each pancake onto the griddle.
Cook until bubbles form and edges are dry, about 2-3 minutes per side.

title: Gluten-Free Cookies
instructions: In a bowl, mix flour, baking soda, and salt.
In another bowl, cream together butter, sugar, and brown sugar.
Beat in eggs and vanilla until smooth.
Gradually add flour mixture, mixing well. Stir in chocolate chips.
Drop by rounded spoonfuls onto ungreased cookie sheets.
Bake for 9-11 minutes or until golden brown.
